SELECT BD.EntCode AS "EntCode" ,Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, D.MultiDisplayName) AS "EntName" ,BD.BizDocCode AS "BizDocCode" ,BD.BizDocID AS "BizDocID" ,BD.BizDocName AS "BizDocName" ,BD.BizDocType AS "BizDocType" ,(SELECT CodeName FROM sys_base_code WHERE Code = BizDocType AND CodeGroup = 'JobFunctionType') AS "BizDocTypeName" ,BD.Description AS "Description" ,BD.SortKey AS "SortKey" ,TO_CHAR(BD.InsertDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS "InsertDate" ,BD.IsUse AS "IsUse" ,BDM.UR_Name AS "UR_Name" ,BDF.FormName AS "FormName" FROM jwf_bizdoc BD LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.BizDocID, LISTAGG(B.DisplayName,',') within group (ORDER BY B.DisplayName) AS UR_Name from jwf_bizdocmember A INNER JOIN sys_object_user B ON A.UserCode = B.UserCode GROUP BY A.BizDocID ) BDM ON BD.BizDocID = BDM.BizDocID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT BDF.BizDocID,LISTAGG(Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, BDF.FormName),',') within group (ORDER BY BDF.FormName) AS FormName FROM jwf_bizdocform BDF GROUP BY BDF.BizDocID ) BDF ON BD.BizDocID = BDF.BizDocID LEFT OUTER JOIN sys_object_domain D ON D.DomainCode = BD.EntCode
AND
BizDocCode BizDocName
LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND BD.BizDocType = #{BizDocType}
AND DomainId = #{EntCode}
AND ( BizDocCode LIKE '%'||#{icoSearch}||'%' OR BizDocName LIKE '%'||#{icoSearch}||'%' )
BD.BizDocName BD.BizDocCode BD.Description BDF.FormName BD.BizDocType BDM.UR_Name BD.InsertDate EntName BD.SortKey
ASC DESC
BD.SortKey ASC

SELECT BD.EntCode AS "EntCode" ,BD.BizDocCode AS "BizDocCode" ,BD.BizDocID AS "BizDocID" ,BD.BizDocName AS "BizDocName" ,BD.BizDocType AS "BizDocType" ,BD.Description AS "Description" ,BD.SortKey AS "SortKey" ,TO_CHAR(BD.InsertDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS "InsertDate" ,BD.IsUse AS "IsUse" ,BDM.UR_Name AS "UR_Name" ,BDF.FormName AS "FormName" FROM jwf_bizdoc BD LEFT OUTER JOIN( SELECT A.BizDocID, LISTAGG(B.DisplayName,',') within group (ORDER BY B.DisplayName) AS UR_Name FROM jwf_bizdocmember A INNER JOIN sys_object_user B ON A.UserCode = B.UserCode GROUP BY A.BizDocID) BDM ON BD.BizDocID = BDM.BizDocID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT BDF.BizDocID,LISTAGG(BDF.FormName,',') within group (ORDER BY BDF.FormName) AS FormName FROM jwf_bizdocform BDF GROUP BY BDF.BizDocID) BDF ON BD.BizDocID = BDF.BizDocID WHERE BD.BizDocID = #{BizDocID}

FormPrefix FormName SortKey
